name: üçøÔ∏è DualSubs Œ≤
author: @DualSubs
description: Subtitle enhancement and bilingual module on streaming media platforms

apps.name: üçøÔ∏è DualSubs: Verify Œ≤
descs_html: Please refer to Instructions for using DualSubs
Don't forget to click 'Save' in the lower right corner of the bottom of this page after completing.

settings.name: [Google Cloud] Translation API Translation method
settings.desc: Paragraph-by-paragraph translation: Each 128 sentences of text is combined to send a translation request, which is friendly to the number or frequency of requests, and the context will be translated with reference; sentence-by-sentence translation: each sentence text sends a translation request;

settings.name: [Google Cloud] Translation API Authentication method
settings.desc: Choose one of two verification methods

settings.name: [Google Cloud] Translation API Authentication key
settings.desc: This type of subtitles will not be enabled when not available.

settings.name: [Microsoft Azure] Translator Translation method
settings.desc: Paragraph-by-paragraph translation: every 100 sentences of text are combined to send a translation request, which is friendly to the number or frequency of requests, and the context will be translated with reference; sentence-by-sentence translation: each sentence text sends a translation request;

settings.name: [Microsoft Azure] Translator Version
settings.desc: Choose one of version two

settings.name: [Microsoft Azure] Translator Area code
settings.desc: If you don't select global when opening Microsoft Azure Translator, you need to fill in the open region code, such as chinanorth, chinaeast2, etc.

settings.name: [Microsoft Azure] Translator Authentication method
settings.desc: Choose one of two verification methods

settings.name: [Microsoft Azure] Translator Authentication key
settings.desc: This type of subtitles will not be enabled when not available

settings.name: [DeepL] API Translation method
settings.desc: Paragraph-by-paragraph translation: every 50 sentences of text are combined to send a translation request, which is friendly to the number or frequency-limited API, and the translation will refer to the context; sentence-by-sentence translation: each text sends a translation request;

settings.name: [DeepL] API Modes
settings.desc: Choose one of mode two

settings.name: [DeepL] API Authentication key
settings.desc: This type of subtitles will not be enabled when not available.

apps.author: @DualSubs

apps.name: üçøÔ∏è DualSubs: Advanced Options Œ≤
descs_html: Please refer to Instructions for using DualSubs
Don't forget to click 'Save' in the lower right corner of the bottom of this page after completing.

settings.name: Translator: Number of retries
settings.desc: Unit: times, positive integer

settings.name: Translator: Retry interval duration
settings.desc: Unit: milliseconds (ms), positive integer

settings.name: Translator: Increasing retry interval
settings.desc: For example, the interval between the first retry is 1000ms, the interval between the second retry is 2000ms, and the interval between the third retry is 4000ms, and so on.

apps.author: @DualSubs

apps.name: üçøÔ∏è DualSubs: YouTube Œ≤
descs_html: Please refer to Instructions for using DualSubs
Don't forget to click 'Save' in the lower right corner of the bottom of this page after completing.

settings.name: Function switch
settings.desc: Whether to enable this platform modification function

settings.name: Preferred language (compatible):
settings.desc: After selection, this language will be added as an additional subtitle language.

settings.name: Subtitle type (compatible)
settings.desc: Please select the type of subtitle you want to replace, which will be replaced by an incompatible player.

settings.name: Translation subtitles: Only translated subtitles are displayed.
settings.desc: After opening, only translated subtitles will be displayed, and no subtitle merging operation will be done.

settings.name: Plug-in subtitles: URL
settings.desc: Compatible with WebVTT and SRT format subtitles

settings.name: Plug-in subtitles: time offset
settings.desc: Unit: milliseconds (ms), positive and negative integers

settings.name: Plug-in subtitles: Only plug-in subtitles are displayed
settings.desc: After opening, only plug-in subtitles will be displayed, and no subtitle merge operation will be done.

settings.name: Bilingual subtitle location
settings.desc: Number of rows in the preferred language

settings.name: Number of playback record caches
settings.desc: This option determines the number of same gateway, same platform, simultaneous processing and playback. If it is only for local use, it can be set to 1. If this machine acts as a gateway to multiple LAN devices to watch and play at the same time, it is recommended to set this value not less than the number of playback devices.

settings.name: Timestamp tolerance
settings.desc: Unit: milliseconds (ms), positive integer, allowable error range when the subtitle timestamp matches

apps.author: @DualSubs
